title: Carl Stephen Junge
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101043818/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101043818/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Carl Stephen Junge**

Carl Stephen Junge, 1880—1972, was a type designer for [Barnhart Brothers & Spindler](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101043818/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Barnhart%20Brothers%20and%20Spindler) designing Caslon Italic Specials (swash letters) in 1924, and Swagger Capitals, 1925.
author: gthompson
